name: Vinicius Dias Barros
title: Data Architect Consultant
about: I’m a Data Engineering Lead with extensive experience in designing scalable data architectures and optimizing end-to-end data workflows. My expertise lies in orchestrating robust pipelines using tools such as Databricks (Auto Loader, Delta Live Tables, streaming pipelines, Unity Catalog, and Liquid Clustering) and Microsoft Fabric (Dataflows, Pipelines, and OneLake integration). I specialize in building reliable ingestion frameworks, real-time data processing solutions, and implementing governance strategies that support data democratization and regulatory compliance, including GDPR.

education.institution: Instituto de Gestão e Tecnologia da Informação

education.degree: Master of Business Administration - MBA, Datascience & Big Data

education.institution: Instituto Federal de Educação, Ciência e Tecnologia de São Paulo - IFSP
